amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit oil and natural gas lease sales off the coasts of Northeast States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 112-398 to prohibit oil and natural gas lease sales in the northeast U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 257 (Roll no. 61).
